text.data-name: NIIT Nfinity is a specialized immersive learning solutions offering from NIIT, a leading provider of Managed Training Services. We create immersive learning experiences that enable natural learning in the flow of work. Through hands-on-practice and authentic decision-making in a safe and true-to-life environment, our goal is to elicit emotional and visceral responses that ultimately drive behavior change.
text.tspan: NIIT Nfinity is a specialized immersive learning solutions
offering from NIIT, a leading provider of Managed Training
Services. We create immersive learning experiences that
enable natural learning in the flow of work. Through hands-
on-practice and authentic decision-making in a safe and
true-to-life environment, our goal is to elicit emotional and
visceral responses that ultimately drive behavior change.
